item.title: Jeju Air crash: Boeing falls 4% in premarket as South Korea orders B737-800 inspection
item.description: "We will examine compliance with various regulations, including operational records, inspections, and maintenance conducted before and after flights."

item.title: Jimmy Carter, the farmer, president and Nobel peace crusader, dies at age 100
item.description: Jimmy Carter, the nation's 39th president, lived longer than any other occupant of the Oval Office.

item.title: Democrats and Republicans honor former President Jimmy Carter's lifetime of service
item.description: Politicians recognized Carter for his presidential accomplishments and humanitarian work after he left the White House.

item.title: Trump says H-1B visa program is 'great' amid MAGA feud over tech workers
item.description: Trump allies, including Elon Musk, vigorously defended the program to other MAGA adherents this week.

item.title: Jimmy Carter quotes: 'I could have wiped Iran off the map'
item.description: "I could have wiped Iran off the map," Jimmy Carter told CNBC in 2014. Memorable quotes from the 39th president.
